common_json.Missions.MagicTournament.Title: Clovers Tournament
common_json.Missions.MagicTournament.Rules1: Make combinations of 4 or more candies to earn Clovers!
common_json.Missions.MagicTournament.AnimationMainTe: You are so kind! Mooo! Iâ€™ll make the best milk now! Thank you and enjoy the prize!
You almost did it! Thank you for gathering clovers for me. Donâ€™t worry, you will win the prize next time!
Clover makes milk so tasty! I wanna make the best milk in the Candyland.
Thatâ€™s why I need so much clover leaves! Letâ€™s see who can get more!
common_json.Missions.RoseTournament.Title: Diamond Rush
common_json.Missions.RoseTournament.Rules1: Collect as many Diamonds as you can to become a Diamond King!
common_json.Missions.RoseTournament.AnimationMainTex: Ooh! You really tried your best! Diamonds are so shiny! Take this as a reward for your effort!
Ooh, itâ€™s not enough for me! I need more. I hope youâ€™ll try harder next time!
I am the Dragon, the Lord of Diamonds! Iâ€™m looking for fearless travelers to collect as many diamonds as they can!
Are you one of them? I have an amazing reward for the top collectors!
common_json.Easter.Missions.RoseTournament.Title: Easter Collection!
common_json.Easter.Missions.RoseTournament.Rules1: Collect as many easter eggs as you can to grow the collection!
common_json.Easter.Missions.RoseTournament.Animation: Ooh! You really tried your best! The eggs are so pretty! Take this as a reward for your effort!
Ooh, itâ€™s not enough for me! I need more. I hope youâ€™ll try harder next time!
I'm not your usual Dragon since I'm a huge Easter fun! I collect different treats all year long to later exchange them for the colored eggs!
Help me grow my collection and I'll shower you with gifts!
common_json.Missions.TulpanTournament.Title: Snacks Boom
common_json.Missions.TulpanTournament.Rules1: Match sweets next to the snacks to collect them!
common_json.Missions.TulpanTournament.AnimationMainT: Woof! Youâ€™re my best friend and a lord of snacks! Woof! Woof! Take your prize!
Woof! I've got some snacks, thanks! Donâ€™t worry about the prize, youâ€™ll get it next time!
Woof! I like snacks so much! I am arranging a contest for the players!
Woof! Bring me as much snacks as you can and you might get a very special prize!
common_json.Valentine.Missions.TulpanTournament.Rule: Match sweets next to the roses to pick them!
common_json.Valentine.Missions.TulpanTournament.Anim: Amazing! This bunch of roses will make so many people happy! Here, take your prize!
Thank you! I'll make sure to deliver these roses! Good luck with the prize next time!
Everyone loves flowers! Let's pick them together and spread the joy around!
So many people want to help me! If your contribution to the cause is substantial I'll make sure to honor it with a reward!
common_json.Memorial.Missions.TulpanTournament.Title: Summer Bloossom
common_json.Memorial.Missions.TulpanTournament.Rules: Match sweets next to the flowers to pick them!
common_json.Memorial.Missions.TulpanTournament.Anima: I can't believe my eyes! All these flowers are mine! You were incredible out there and here is your well-deserved reward!
Thank you! Your effort means a lot to me but these are not enough to celebrate summer. Better luck next time!
There is no better time to pick flowers than summer! Let's pick them together to celebrate the start of this wonderful time!
Unfortunately, there are not enough flowers for everyone! Help me pick as many as possible and I'll make sure to return the favor!

common_json.BuildingStartWindow.subTitle: Level %{level}
DailyLevel.Status: New record: completed the level in 12 seconds! We are such a unit!
Never before so quickly passed a level! I'm in a blow today!
I click the words like nuts! Another record is broken!
I guessed the words on the level the first time and continued my series!
My triumphal march continues! I canâ€™t keep up with me!
Guessed all the words in seconds! It is unlikely that anyone will repeat this!
Hurray! I was faster than 98% of people who have passed this level!
It's nice to be in 1% of the players who have passed the level faster than anyone!
I am again among the best players! How nice it is!
Personally, I do not know anyone who could pass this level faster!

common_json.TreasureSearchWindow.text: Flowers are valued in Candyland. Anyone would pay you handsomely for a set of these beautiful plants. Grow four of them and be rewarded!
common_json.TreasureSearchWindow.Help.Title: How does it work?
common_json.TreasureSearchWindow.Help.Text:
1) Get one watering can for completing a regular level and three watering cans for beating the hard one!

2) Use them to water sections of your garden!

3) Grow four flowers and exchange that wonderful bouquet on a box full of goodies!

project_json.Keypad.force: Connect letters by swiping to spell out the words.
project_json.DailyCup.force: Partake in the daily cup every threee hours to get prizes!
project_json.DailyCupRulesWindow.text2: The cup starts every three hours. All players are given the same level even if they haven't reached it yet.
project_json.FirstBoostersBefore.force: Shows how many letters the words you can already guess have.
project_json.SecondBoostersBefore.force: Heads up! At the beginning of the level all the letters of all the words will be shown to you temporarily.
project_json.ThirdBoostersBefore.force: A magnifier will randomly mark a letter of one of the words. Guess it to activate a hint for another word.
project_json.BoosterBeforeUse_15: 5 hints randomly scattered on the level.
project_json.Halloween.Missions.LetterTournament.Rule: Guess words to collect as many sweets as you can!
project_json.Halloween.MissionRulesWindow.LetterTourn: Guess words to collect sweets on the gaming field and complete levels to make sure they are being credited.
project_json.Valentine.MissionRulesWindow.LetterTourn: Guess words to collect hearts on the gaming field and complete levels to make sure they are being credited.
project_json.TileShop.highlightPack1.Title: 10x Magic Flashlight
project_json.TileShop.eyePack2.Title: 10x Cat's Vision
project_json.TileShop.eyePack2.Description: 10 units of Cat's Visions with amazing discount!
project_json.Shop.eyePack2.boughtMessage: You bought 10 units of Cat's Visions!
project_json.TileShop.hintBoosterBeforePack3.Title: 10x Super Magnifier
project_json.TileShop.sweetPack.Description: 500 coins and 2 booster of each type!
project_json.TileShop.jamPack.Description: 1800 coins and 3 boosters of each type!
project_json.TileShop.tastyPack.Description: 3800 coins and 5 boosters of each type!
project_json.TileShop.honeyPack.Description: 6000 coins and 7 boosters of each type!

project_json.BackgroundsWindow.moveNextText: Good job! We hope that our gift will make your time in %{place} more enjoyable!
project_json.TreasureSearchWindow.Title: Fresh Flowers!
project_json.TreasureSearchWindow.text: Ginger adores the smell of flowers. Help him water the beds to collect 4 flowers and you will be rewarded!
project_json.ShovelsTooltip: Pass levels to get watering cans
project_json.WardrobeDescText: Complete levels to find the perfect Christmas outfit for your cat or buy them now!
project_json.WardrobeRulesText: Collect amazing Christmas wardrobes for Ginger! Each item from the list can be earned by completing specific amount of levels, or be bought with coins. Limited time only!
project_json.WardrobeDialogue.stage0.text0: I decided to go out caroling this year. It's my first time and I want to look the part but I don't have a proper outfit. Let's meet later to find one!
project_json.WardrobeDialogue.stage1.text0: This looks cozy and warm... But maybe too warm! I don't think I can wear this. Let's continue our search.
project_json.WardrobeDialogue.stage2.text0: This looks nice. But let's look for something else. Maybe for a more cat-related pattern.
project_json.WardrobeDialogue.stage3.text0: I think we're getting closer. But I don't want to compete with Santa Claus even though my paws are snug.
project_json.WardrobeDialogue.stage4.text0: Perfect! It even says Merry Christmas. I'm just not sure that blue is the right color for me... What else do you have?
project_json.WardrobeDialogue.stage5.text0: Warmer! We're getting closer but I'm getting colder. Is there anything less exposing?
project_json.WardrobeDialogue.stage6.text0: Okay, I'm starting to feel that you're too literal. I appreciate the thought but I don't want to get boiled while celebrating Christmas...
project_json.WardrobeDialogue.stage7.text0: Your help means a lot to me but my friends won't recognize me dressed up like this. Maybe save it for Halloween?!
project_json.WardrobeDialogue.stage8.text0: I think I'm going to wear this one. Unless you have something else laying around?
project_json.WardrobeDialogue.stage9.text0: We've found it. Perfect Christmas outfit. I know it doesn't look warm but it fills me up with joy and holiday spirit and I couldn't wish for more!
project_json.Missions.LetterTournament.Title: Happy New Yarn
project_json.MissionRulesWindow.LetterTournament.text: Guess words to collect balls of yarn on the gaming field and complete levels to make sure they are being credited.
project_json.Xmas.Missions.LetterTournament.Title: Christmas Stockings
project_json.Xmas.MissionRulesWindow.LetterTournament: Guess words to collect stockings on the gaming field and complete levels to make sure they are being credited.
project_json.Valentines.BonusWorld.Force: I'm very excited about Valentine's Day! Accept my invitation to the world of romance and guess words related to it to get the rewards from Cupid!
project_json.Valentines.BonusWorldFinishWindow.Title: Congratulations!
project_json.Valentines.BonusWorldFinishWindow.Text: Your Valentine's Day journey is complete. I hope you enjoyed it as much as I did. I can't wait for our next adventure!
project_json.Easter.BonusWorld.Force: I'm very excited about this holiday! Accept my invitation to the world of Easter and guess words related to it to get rewards from Easter Bunny!
project_json.Easter.BonusWorldFinishWindow.Title: Congratulations!
project_json.Easter.BonusWorldFinishWindow.Text: Your Easter journey is complete. I hope you enjoyed it as much as I did. I can't wait for our next adventure!
project_json.Easter.Missions.LetterTournament.Title: Honey Bunny
project_json.Easter.MissionRulesWindow.LetterTourname: Guess words to collect bunnies on the gaming field and complete levels to make sure they are being credited.
project_json.Memorial.Missions.LetterTournament.Title: Ice Cream Season
project_json.Memorial.MissionRulesWindow.LetterTourna: Guess words to collect ice cream cones on the gaming field and complete levels to make sure they are being credited.
project_json.Summer.BonusWorld.Force: I'm very excited about the summer! Accept my invitation to the world of joy and basking and guess words related to my favorite season to get awesome rewards!
project_json.Summer.BonusWorldFinishWindow.Title: Congratulations!
project_json.Summer.BonusWorldFinishWindow.Text: Our summer journey is complete. I hope you enjoyed it as much as I did. I can't wait for our next adventure!
